extended_drawer.drawer.upgrade_fail: Can't change upgrade; too many items.
book.extended_drawers.guide.name: Extending Drawers
book.extended_drawers.guide.landing_text: This guide will take you through all the steps of setting up great storage systems using drawers, as well as how each item and block in the mod work.
book.extended_drawers.guide.subtitle: Version ${version}
config.extended_drawers.storage.defaultC: How many items drawers are able to hold without upgrades.
config.extended_drawers.storage.compacti: How many items compacting drawers are able to hold without upgrades.
config.extended_drawers.storage.stackSiz: Whether the stack size of the stored item should affect drawer capacity.
config.extended_drawers.storage.slotCoun: Whether the amount of slots on a drawers should affect the capacity.
config.extended_drawers.storage.upgradeM: The multipliers that the upgrades apply to the capacity of drawers.
config.extended_drawers.misc.insertAllTi: The max time between the clicks of a double click for inserting all items. Measured in ticks.
config.extended_drawers.misc.creativeExt:
How extraction in creative should be handled. Possible values:
- 'normal': Vanilla instant creative breaking
- 'front_mine': The front face is mined like in survival. The rest break instantly
- 'all_mine': Every face can be mined like in survival
- 'front_no_break': The block can't be broken from the front
- 'all_no_break': The block can't be broken at all
config.extended_drawers.misc.blockUpgrad: If enabled you can't remove upgrades if the slot would overflow after removal.
config.extended_drawers.misc.allowRecurs: Allows you to place drawers insider shulker boxes and other drawers. Warning: Deeply nested storage can lead to chunk and player data corruption.
config.extended_drawers.misc.drawersDrop: If enabled, drawers will drop their contents instead of retaining them when broken. Can cause a lot of lag.
config.extended_drawers.client.itemRende: The render distance of the item icon on drawers in blocks.
config.extended_drawers.client.iconRende: The render distance of the lock and upgrade icons on drawers in blocks.
config.extended_drawers.client.textRende: The render distance of the number of items on the drawers in blocks.
config.extended_drawers.client.displayEm: Whether to display the amount of items on empty drawers.
config.extended_drawers.client.itemScale: The scale at which item icons render on drawers.
